text: Robert S. Kiss (November 27, 1957 â€“ November 5, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. He was the 54th Speaker of the House for the West Virginia House of Delegates from 1997 until 2007. He was born in Raleigh County, West Virginia. Kiss died of cancer in Huntington, West Virginia, at age 63, on November 5, 2021.Former House Speaker Bob Kiss dies ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from West Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Cancer deaths in West Virginia
title: Robert S. Kiss
